bottleneck: Build failure in BookingForm.tsx due to type mismatch in schema.ts (Critical Blocker)

Appointment.notes: Form component schema mismatch resolved. Build verified.

fix_implemented: Explicitly cast Zod resolver in packages/appointment-form/BookingForm.tsx to Resolver<BookingFormValues>.
impact: Restored ability to build and deploy the application without compromising schema strictness or default values.
verification: Ran pnpm build (success) and pnpm test packages/appointment-form/schema.test.ts (success).
